Index.title: Hi! I am Joel Taylor
Index.description: a young and passionate front-end developer crafting innovative and precise web solutions. Join me on a journey of continuous learning, and let's create something extraordinary together.

about.title: About Me
about.description: From building my first computer at 13 to thriving in the First Lego League and venturing into web development, my journey is a testament to adaptability and continuous learning. Today, as a passionate web developer, I invite you to collaborate and turn your digital dreams into reality. Let's make it happen together!

portfolio.title: Portfolio
portfolio.description: Dive into my portfolio showcasing a spectrum of impactful projects, demonstrating expertise in web development and beyond. For an in-depth look at the code, visit my GitHub.

researchProject.title: Check out my Research Project!
researchProject.description: Have a look at my research project, 'SEO Practices to Improve Rankings in SERPs', delving into advanced SEO strategies using React JS and Tailwind CSS. From overcoming obstacles to transformative results.
